news_items.title: FBI Director Kash Patel’s pistol gifts spark controversy
news_items.summary: On a visit to New Zealand, FBI Director Kash Patel gave the country’s police and spy bosses gifts of inoperable pistols that were illegal to possess under local gun laws and had to be destroyed.
